    • Method Detail

      • joinGame

        @PostMapping(value="/games/join-game/{playerId}")
public Games joinGame(@PathVariable(value="playerId")
                                                                        int playerId)
        Used remove add a player to a game. Will add the player to the first open position in the oldest game that has not yet been started. It will not add a player to a game that said player is already in.
        Parameters:
        playerId - the id of the player joining a game
        Returns:
        the game that the player joined

      • leaveGame

        @PostMapping(value="/games/leave-game/{gameId}/{playerId}")
public Games leaveGame(@PathVariable(value="gameId")
                                                                                   int gameId,
                                                                                   @PathVariable(value="playerId")
                                                                                   int playerId)
        Used remove a player from a game
        Parameters:
        gameId - the id of the game that the player will be removed from
        playerId - the id of the player being removed
        Returns:
        the game that the player was removed from

        @PatchMapping(value="/games")
public Games updateAchievement(@RequestBody
                                                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> updates)
        Used to update attributes of a game The updates object must contain id of the desired game to update
        Parameters:

        the updated game
